Package jdbc

package jdbc
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ConnectionPool
    ConnectionPool is a manual implementation of a simple connection pooling mechanism.
    DBExecutor
    DBExecutor provides utility methods to simplify database access using a connection pool.
    mysqlConnection
    This class provides database-related utility methods for managing BPARK system data, such as subscribers, reservations, parking spots, and active parkings.
